name: Butterflies
description:
NOTE: This is the container app for the episodes. To play, you'll have to buy an episode.

Butterflies is a video game about inline skating and graffiti.

Apparently some people did that before, but they don't seem like they'll be doing it anymore.

So, here are some skates and some cans, and some adrenaline-pumping tunes to hype you up for the ride. You'll be dodging your way through taser cameras, angry cops and much more. Go paint. Or don't. Be free. Be everywhere and nowhere. Run. Jump. Fly - like a butterfly.

Features


  • Ultra-tight momentum-based platforming and timing-based graffiti system
  • Pumping soundtrack by a variety of artists including Sashko Naganuma, DJ Saturn, Frostix, Graphiqsgroove and many more
  • Open-world maps and mission-based single-player story with unlockable characters
  • Splitscreen multiplayer with race, tag and survival modes
